name: HellScape (atheniann, Brandmuffin, YasmeenLec, Chrizon123)
description:
A demon baby's trying to make his way through hell's different zones, but the natural inhabitants seem hell-bent (heh) on stopping him! Explore the depths of hell and unlock powerful abilities with baby demon's sheer willpower.

Controls

Encounter strange creatures

Discover new powers
